title: Fortune.st
author: Fortune.st
created_time: November 26, 2022, 07:50:04 AMLast edit: November 29, 2022, 10:21:59 AM by Fortune.st
content: I need a trusted remember who can make 31 USD payment pnline. All you need to do is to login to the account and pay for the item on the cart. I will send you your money in Crypto.I have also added Skrill please. If you have Skrill account and interested in making the payment, just reach out and let us get it done in minutes. If you pass the test, there many be more deal awaiting. We may send the Crypto to you first if we consider you to be very trustworthy.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: You can visit this thread and contact the OP https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5319403.0 but if preferably you have to send the funds first before person can buy the goods or the items because you don't know how much the person has in his account. The login information must be yours or the buyer's details? It must be the buyer's details because it is not you that is buying it.

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on November 26, 2022, 08:23:46 AMYou can visit this thread and contact the OP https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5319403.0 but if preferably you have to send the funds first before person can buy the goods or the items because you don't know how much the person has in his account. The login information must be yours or the buyer's details? It must be the buyer's details because it is not you that is buying it.Thanks for the suggestion. Yes, I can change the login information to the buyers details, then change it back to mine after the transaction. can you do that? The link you posted, the OP is not offering Paypal payment. Send me a direct message lets see of you can do that.

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.body: What you will be paying for is just a tiny product from a reputable vendor on a reputable platform. In return you will get some additional tokens for your effort. Contact me immediately if you have fund in your Paypal and willing to carry this out in minutes.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: If I may ask, why can't you do the shopping yourself?Also Is it mandatory that you later have access to the personal data of the person who will make the payment for you? I am not sure that you will find someone who will take such a risk because of additional tokens.and yes, what exactly are these additional tokens and how much are they worth?

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.created_time: November 28, 2022, 12:05:13 PMLast edit: November 28, 2022, 06:57:57 PM by Fortune.st
comments.body: Quote from: Edwardard on November 28, 2022, 11:20:08 AMQuote from: Fortune.st on November 28, 2022, 10:55:45 AMQuote from: usdt2021x on November 27, 2022, 04:17:38 PMQuote from: Fortune.st on November 26, 2022, 07:50:04 AMI need a trusted remember who can help me buy 31 USD stuff online. All you need to do is to login to the account and pay for the item on the cart. I will send you your money with Crypto.I have also added Skrill please. If you have Skrill account and interested in making the payment, just reach out and let us get it done in minutes.Hello i can do thé payement wirh skrill what website IS ?Hello,In case you're having difficulty replying my direct messages, you can email me directly via this email address fortunecasino @ protonmail.com. We can get it done immediately and I am online to reply all your messages. Thank uYou wrote in the OP that you need a trusted member and now you are trying to deal with a newbie of your same kind. Not a good sign. High chance either of you are gonna get scammed here! Anyways, I wouldnt recommend anyone to do such type of deals with the OP!I don't think it is fair to categorize some users as untrustworthy simply because their accounts are new. There are good number of legitimate respectable individuals who might just have discovered Bitcointalk and decided to signup. It wouldn't be fair nor wise to blatantly label them as untrustworthy base on their membership status. We don't do that as a company.When I said trusted members, I didn't say the member must be a Hero Member or New Member. Instead, I just said Trusted member and I reserve the right to use my own discretion to decide who is to be trusted base on my own personal judgement and my interactions with them. I have not assigned that duty to anyone to decide for me. Therefore I don't think you have the right to decide who I deal with, neither can you decide for anyone else.If you have any trusted member you think that can do the job for us, feel free to recommend the user to us. If you think you can, then state your intention and let me decide whether to patronize you or not. We are open to using escrow if necessary. Thank you for your contribution.
